FAMR 0.0.10
  • Reference

Run cTWAS-style regression framework

run_modified_ctwas.Rd

Given the output from learn_wts_precomp_merge, computes the final Z-score vector and R matrix, uses a cTWAS-style framework to infer priors for each "class" of variables (SNPs and exposures/factors), and then generates the final PIPs for each variable using Susie-RSS. Also runs a separate factor-only regression to isolate factor effects from exposure effects.

Usage

run_modified_ctwas(dat, L, n_iter, n_expo, n_samp, annih)

Arguments

dat

A list object, usually from learn_wts_precomp_merge, with the following elements:

sumstats

A list object containing summary statistics for all exposures and factors; see the all_sumstats parameter of learn_wts_precomp_merge for the format.

ld

A sparse Matrix object with the LD for the SNPs in the sumstats object.

numerator

A numeric vector representing the numerator of the Z-scores for each exposure and factor.

wRw

A numeric matrix of associations between traits (exposures and factors), used for computing both Z and R

Rgx

A numeric matrix of inferred correlations between SNPs and traits (exposures and outcomes), with one row per SNP and one column per exposure/factor.

L

a numeric value representing the maximum number of effects (more precisely, credible sets) Susie-RSS can model on the outcome

n_iter

number of cTWAS expectation-maximization (EM) iterations to run for fitting prior parameters; usually 10-30 is good.

n_expo

number of exposures being analyzed

n_samp

number of samples used to generate exposure summary statistics

annih

boolean indicating whether the annihilate flag was used (whether factors were regressed out of exposures and outcome). See annihilate_factors for more details.

Value

A list with some or all of the following elements:

pips

A list of the learned PIPs for each exposure, factor, and SNP.

zscores

A list of the marginal association z-scores learned for each exposure, factor, and SNP with the outcome.

R

A matrix of the estimated correlations between each pair of variables (exposures, factors, and SNPs).

susieres

The full susie_rss results object. See the susieR documentation for more details.

priors

A list containing the learned prior effect probabilities and prior effect variances learned for each class of variables (i.e. SNPs and exposures/factors).

posterior_mean

A list containing the posterior means learned for each variable by susie_rss.

posterior_var

A list containing the posterior variances learned for each variable by susie_rss.

factor_corrs

A matrix of correlations between the learned factor summary statistics and those of the exposures. Deprecated in favor of the R matrix.
